title: First Meeting of Semester
details: Kick-off meeting for the semester. Discuss plans, upcoming events, and goals for the organization.

title: Welcome Party
details: A casual gathering to welcome new members and help everyone get to know each other.

title: Membership Drive
details: Recruit new members for the organization. Share information about benefits, projects, and involvement opportunities.

title: General Body Meeting
details: Monthly general body meeting to review past activities, plan future events, and discuss member participation.
